name: vitepress-ydkjs
description: The You Don't Know JS Yet (book series) - 2nd Edition in vitepress generator. It will be updated automatically every day.

scripts.prestart: cd src/ydkjs && git stash && git pull && cd ../..
scripts.dev: yarn prestart && yarn replace && vitepress dev src
scripts.serve: yarn prestart && yarn replace && vitepress serve src
scripts.build: yarn prestart && yarn replace && vitepress build src
